## bind_sports_race_data

## Description
 Bind sports race data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_sports_race_data( 
  ., 
  data = NULL, 
  name = NULL, 
  times = NULL, 
  start_image = NULL, 
  race_image = NULL, 
  finish_image = NULL, 
  color_category = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| data | A data frame |
| name | Name of participant |
| times | One or more columns of numbers, representing splits or laps, or a whole race |
| start_image | The URL of the image to use at the start of the race |
| race_image | The URL of the image to use while a participant is racing |
| finish_image | The URL of the image to use when the participant has finished the race |
| color_category | Add a category to color participants by. If empty, the "name" column will be used for colors. |
